comment.author: 26220432@N06
comment._content:
** translation of describtion **

Repatriates. Family from Indonesia at the churchsquare in Maastricht. The children are feeding the pigeons with the parents in the back.
Holland, Maastricht, 1962

comment.author: 31853477@N02
comment._content: Dit is het Vrijthof in Maastricht met rechts de huidige behuizing van de provinciaal commandant en links de St Servaasbasiliek
